Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Andoletta], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Arazni], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Count Ranalc], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Doloras], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Likha], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Naderi], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Narakaas], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pulura], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ravithra], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Shizuru], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Sifkesh], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.The Lost Prince], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Vildeis], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Zyphus]

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Lament]; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Overflowing Sorrow]

You have a painful connection to melancholy and sadness.
name: Sorrow Domain
